meanings.definition: A person who makes or sells cups.
meanings.sent1: The cuppier at the store showed me different types of cups.
meanings.sent2: The cuppier had a wide selection of cups for sale.
meanings.sent3: The cuppier joked that he could 'cup' up a storm with all the cups he had.
meanings.sent4: The cuppier's passion for cups made him the cup master of the town.
meanings.sent5: The cuppier's expertise in cups was unmatched in the area.

meanings.sent1: This cup is cuppier than the one I had yesterday.
meanings.sent2: The new cup is cuppier than the old one.
meanings.sent3: The cuppier cup was like a cupcake compared to the plain ones.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was cuppier than a cup of hot cocoa on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The cuppier cup shone brighter than the rest on the shelf.

meanings.sent1: That cup is the cuppiest one in the whole collection.
meanings.sent2: The cuppiest mug in the cupboard is my favorite.
meanings.sent3: The cuppiest cup in the set was so shiny it almost sparkled.
meanings.sent4: Her joy was the cuppiest of all when she received the special cup.
meanings.sent5: The cuppiest cup on the table caught everyone's eye.
